ru-en: Kurginyan: under the guise of democracy, the United States brings bandits to power

The United States uses words about democracy in order to put in place leaders who pursue a course of modernization and development in their countries around the world, frenzied bandits, said political scientist, leader of the movement "The Essence of Time" Sergei Kurginyan on April 12 in the program "Civilization" Russia " on the air of Radio KP.

“Now it is said that our axis of evil is authoritarianism. Since when? What oak tree did they fall from? This authoritarianism was called "authoritarian modernization", they prayed for it. They talked about [Haitian President Francois] Duvalier, a wild bandit and dictator, that “this is a son of a bitch, but this is our son of a bitch!”, that this is “authoritarian capitalism,” Kurginyan said about the US attitude towards dictatorships in the period after World War II .
He noted that such leaders did not shy away from outright crimes, being patronized by the United States due to the fact that they were heading for "authoritarian modernization."

“They said the same about everyone else. Chiang Kai-shek, his torture prisons in Peitou and everywhere ... with his son and Ray Klein, who was there [and oversaw their activities], Deputy [CIA Director Allen] Dulles for intelligence. What was that? Democracy? No, it was an authoritarian modernization,” the political scientist explained.

Kurginyan further emphasized that the attitude of the United States towards leaders who pursued a policy of modernizing their countries changed dramatically in the 2000s, even towards more moderate and obedient to the will of the West.

“Now everyone, including this unfortunate [Egyptian President Hosni] Mubarak, who just licked the feet of the West, they are all accused of being authoritarian leaders and they should be crushed. And in their place they put frenzied bandits. Frantic! Cannibals. And they said: these are democrats!” the political scientist assessed what was happening.

According to him, all this can have the only possible explanation: the United States is preparing to plunge the whole world into chaos, hoping that it will be able to provide relative order on its territory.

Recall that in the summer of 2005, speaking at the American University of Cairo, the head of the US State Department, Condoleezza Rice, said that the US had been trying to maintain stability in the Middle East for too long at the expense of democracy.
She went on to say that these attempts have not led the US to the desired result, so the US is ready to "throw away all excuses that hold back the hard work of democracy."
Lukashenka admitted that he is a dictator - but this is good for Belarus

President of Belarus Alexander Lukashenko believes that without a dictatorship in the country, Belarusians "would go naked." He also criticized Western democracy, dwelling on the alleged advantages of the Belarusian regime. This was reported on April 29 by BelTA.
In particular, Lukashenka compared the Belarusian regime with democratic Poland, Lithuania and Latvia, stating that these countries supposedly have no salt, so people are not allowed into Belarus.

- That's the whole democracy! Thank God we have a dictatorship. You all criticized me: dictatorship, dictatorship. But there is order under this dictatorship. There would be no dictatorship, so they would go naked, - he added.

In addition, the Belarusian president noted that the sanctions that were imposed on Moscow and Minsk because of the war in Ukraine will not break the country, on the contrary, they force them to look for new opportunities.
- The market is open, we must move, not cry, - said the dictator.
Lukashenka stressed that it would not be possible to bring Belarus and Russia to their knees due to sanctions, since these "countries have sufficient resources, technologies and intelligence."

Earlier, he noted that the Republic of Belarus and the Russian Federation are trying to build a single Union State on new principles, "so that no one is offended." Lukashenka is sure that other republics of the former Soviet Union will also join such an alliance.
News of Ukraine
Kyiv does not intend to cede its territories for a diplomatic settlement of the conflict, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky said in an interview with CNN.
“Ukrainians are not ready to give up their land, to agree that these territories belong to Russia. This is our land. We all talk about it and intend to prove it,” he said.
I wonder if you got tired of repeating this mantra? In Kyiv, it is pronounced regularly, and sometimes they talk about the readiness to recognize the borders on 02/24/2022.
So quite recently, the fact that Kyiv could discuss with Moscow the country's borders as of "until February 24," said the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine Dmitry Kuleba.

“It would not be very wise for me to disclose our conditions, but today each item can be the subject of dialogue,” he said, stressing that Ukraine will continue to protect the integrity and sovereignty of its territory.
And in early May, Zelensky himself demanded that Russia return to “the borders until February 24.” True, with the proviso that it is also necessary to "give Crimea back."

From the regularly changing wording, only one conclusion can be drawn: Kyiv is not ready for negotiations at all and is doing everything to prevent them from taking place. In any case, no one asks about his wishes on the terms of potential negotiations.
“Zelensky can stop the fighting only if he has a reason to declare victory over Russia,” said Dmitry Galkin, a political observer for the 2000 newspaper.

“Otherwise, he risks losing the support of the United States and Great Britain and giving Poroshenko a reason to organize mass protests within the country. Therefore, Zelensky will refuse to resume negotiations, saying that Ukraine will not be able to resume them until Russia promises to give up Crimea and Donbass. But in the event that Zelensky is able to conclude a peace agreement without jeopardizing his political future, then this issue will be removed from the agenda, and its resolution will be declared a matter of the future.
"SP": - Is there a feeling that Kyiv is doing everything to prevent dialogue at all?

- Kyiv really does not need dialogue now, since it does not have the ability to conclude peace without first demonstrating any significant success on the battlefield. However, Kyiv cannot completely abandon the dialogue, since such a step will produce an unfavorable impression both on European countries and on that part of Ukrainian society that wants a speedy cessation of hostilities. Therefore, Zelensky highlights territorial differences, which at this stage could well be put out of the brackets.
"SP": - Biden has said more than once that he is not going to force Ukraine to give up territories. But what about in reality? Not going or not able?

- Of course, the UK and Poland would like Ukraine to continue to fight with Russia, and the US administration does not object to the continuation of this military conflict. However, Zelensky in the current situation cannot make peace, not so much because of external pressure, but because of the internal political situation. The military clash with Russia provided Zelensky with the opportunity to destroy Poroshenko as a significant political player and guarantee himself sole dominance in the Ukrainian political space. However, this requires that, under his leadership, Ukraine be able to defeat Russia. In this case, he will have carte blanche to form a post-war political system. As long as there is no such reason, Zelensky needs to continue military operations, as this allows him to block the activities of the opposition media and deprives the opposition of the opportunity to put pressure on the authorities through protest actions.

"SP": - In the West, many politicians, meanwhile, are ready for the fact that Ukraine may lose territories, and are ready for peace on any terms. But they are still in the minority. What needs to happen for their point of view to prevail?

- As long as the UK and the US are interested in continuing the conflict, the Ukrainian leadership will not listen to the opinion of European politicians who propose to make peace as soon as possible, agreeing to concessions in favor of Russia. I do not think that the position of Washington and London on this issue will change in the foreseeable future. Therefore, the decision of the Ukrainian authorities to agree to make peace on Russian terms can only be determined by internal political factors.

“Kyiv’s position on peace negotiations has noticeably toughened, and this happened under the obvious supervision of NATO, the United States and Great Britain,” said Larisa Shesler, chairman of the Union of Political Emigrants and Political Prisoners of Ukraine.

- It is quite obvious that the conditions set by Kyiv are absolutely unacceptable for Russia, so there are no prospects for their beginning. But this is good, because the preservation of the current power in Ukraine is contrary to Russia's security interests.

"SP": - Earlier, Kuleba said that Kyiv could discuss the country's borders with Moscow as of "until February 24." That is, they agree to the loss of Crimea and part of the Donbass, or how is this to be understood?

- A return to the state of February 24, Kuleba and Zelensky designated as conditions for the start of negotiations. The Ukrainian authorities argued that Russia should return all the territories occupied after February 24, and only after that Ukraine would agree to sit down at the negotiating table on the further fate of the LPR and LPR republics and Crimea.

It is quite obvious that any construction that marks the beginning of the negotiation process will be perceived as a betrayal both in Russian and Ukrainian society. The propaganda dispersed in the Ukrainian media about the inevitable victory of Ukraine over Russia makes it absolutely impossible to have a dialogue about peace with Russia, otherwise than on the terms of Russia's surrender.
"SP": - What kind of dialogue can we talk about if they are not ready to recognize reality? Or is no one going to conduct a dialogue in Kyiv?

- This is not about dialogue, but about an ultimatum presented to Russia by the collective West. Ukraine is a tool, not an active player. It is enough to listen to how seriously the issue of reparations that Russia will be forced to pay to Ukraine is being discussed in order to understand the complete inadequacy of the Ukrainian side.

"SP": - According to the head of the Ukrainian delegation, David Arakhamia, in August Kyiv can conduct "counter-offensive operations in some places" and return to dialogue, but from a position of strength. Do they seriously believe this or is it just propaganda aimed at an internal audience?

- The Ukrainian side is committed seriously, in my opinion, counts on obtaining a superweapon that will defeat the Russian army. Since the main receipts of Western weapons are planned for August-September, it is for this period that the Kyiv authorities are preparing counterattacks in the Donbass, in the Kherson and Zaporozhye regions. This confidence is fueled by the decisions of the NATO countries at Ramstein-3, the promises of lend-lease from the United States and the loud statements of Boris Johnson and Blinken.
"SP": - Kyiv itself determines this line of behavior, or the West dictates? In the West, many politicians, meanwhile, are ready for the fact that Ukraine may lose territories.

- Of course, Ukraine has become a zone where NATO is waging war with Russia by proxy. Some Western politicians are aware of the enormous cost to the economy of sanctions and are willing to reduce support for Ukraine in order to force it to the negotiating table.

But most of the Western elite aims at the actual destruction of Russia, and for this they are ready for a temporary deterioration in the state of the economy and the living standards of the population. They rightly remember how the collapse of the USSR in the 1990s turned into the rise of the Western economy, which received at its disposal all the resources of the USSR and its huge domestic market. Likewise at the present time, they expect that the liquidation of Russia will solve the problems of the economic and social crisis of the developed countries of the West, and return energy and other resources of Russia under its full control. The loss of territory, population, or even statehood by Ukraine is an absolutely insignificant problem for them, not worthy of attention.
"SP": - In your opinion, Ukraine's refusal to recognize reality and enter into negotiations reduce its chances to survive in any form at all? That is, Kyiv's stubbornness plays into our hands?

“I always say that our enemies will not let us down. If Ukraine had at least some sane leadership, if the West had had a more adequate approach to the Russian elite, the Minsk agreements would have been implemented long ago.
But the West needs a complete capitulation from Russia, and a complete transfer of sovereignty and control over all resources into the hands of "democratic countries"

And since Western leaders constantly declare that the outcome of the conflict will be decided on the battlefield, and not at the negotiating table, we have a chance that “reliable negotiators” will not merge Russia's interests.
But, of course, in these conditions, Ukraine's chance to survive is very small.
Zelensky latest news

By September 1, Ukraine is obliged to pay $1.4 billion of public external debt, according to Bloomberg, one of the two leading US providers of financial information for professional financial market participants.

At the same time, he refers to his own calculations, which are considered very reliable in the world of big finance. At the same time, the external debt of the "square" is 56.83 billion dollars. And by the end of 2022, 3.4 billion dollars must be paid.
The agency's sources said that the Ukrainian authorities acknowledge that the ability to pay off loans "is close to drying up."

According to Bloomberg, several solutions to the problem are being worked out. For example, an issuer may request a bondholder to change the terms of an issued security. Or it will ask for the use of frozen Russian assets as collateral.

Also, a draft appeal to President Zelensky has already been submitted to the Rada with a request to start negotiations with foreign partners regarding the cancellation of the state external debt of the country.
The network reacted to this news quite actively. At the same time, users do not see a way out for Ukraine from the financial impasse into which the Kyiv regime has driven it:
“The West is deliberately driving Ukraine into slavery so that any next ruler will be cornered.”
“They confuse Europe with Russia… They’ll write off their debts there, of course.”
“Most likely, the West is using Ukraine as a consumable. And the West is profitable. Western countries, including the United States, fought with proxy,” these are typical comments.
A well-known Russian economist, expert Alexander Bunich, as a professional, very, very doubts that the Kyiv regime will ever pay off its creditors.

“The West, by giving money to Ukraine, is conducting a risky financial operation, it must come to terms with this idea and prepare public opinion for the fact that the loans will not be repaid. The money may never come back. This is, first of all.

Secondly, what, in particular, the Americans give to Ukraine, they are trying to formalize it as a lend-lease. Similar to World War II. To now expose Russia indirectly similar to fascist Germany, and Ukraine as an ally country.

Great Britain and the European Union are also trying to condition the return of many types of assistance. That is, almost all assistance to Ukraine will turn into commercial debt for it. Ukraine is now a "black hole" for finance - you can pump in one hundred billion, or two hundred, it will absorb everything. And then the Kyiv authorities will say that everything is spent or lost on the battlefield, there is nothing to return.
The main debt of Ukraine is huge. After all, it is necessary to take the total external debt, and not just the state (in 2021, the total debt was about $ 90 billion.

Now they need to add to them all the credits scored for the special operation - ed.) And she cannot serve him. It is already measured in hundreds of billions of dollars, and will gradually increase and increase.

And Ukraine still demands that seven billion or even more per month be transferred to support. The one and a half billion to be paid in September is just a current payment. And then they are not going to make it either. I do not even see the prospects of any payments.
"SP": - What will happen if Ukraine does not pay?

- Most likely, they will be given an installment plan or another loan to pay off loans. The IMF will figure something out. That's just the amount there hung an order of magnitude more than discussed now. And it will be possible to talk about their return only if the Kyiv regime wins the military campaign. Well, if he loses, there will be no one to pay. It is clear that the new government will refuse to take on the debts that the current regime has got into. The issue will somehow be resolved by the September payment, but how Ukraine will continue to pay is a big question.
"SP": - There is an assumption that the West will send frozen Russian assets to pay off Ukrainian debts.
“There are a lot of legal conflicts here. You can talk about this for a long time and at length, but if it comes to putting this idea into practice, a number of problems will arise.

The main thing is that Russia, in turn, has debts: both public debt, and total debt, and corporate debt. She can stop payments. Plus, there is the property and assets of non-residents, which Russia is already partially blocking, but can block much more.

So, before disposing of the frozen Russian funds, it is necessary to calculate the consequences of this. Now Russia is ready to pay off the public debt, but the West does not want to receive these payments. However, there is still a lot of corporate debt. And, in a good way, if we use the frozen Russian assets, then the repayment of corporate debts will be a priority.
The first in line will be real creditors who have suffered from Russia's countermeasures, not Ukraine. Yes, it will most likely not be on this list at all.

The expert also explained that the blocked Russian assets are divided into two categories. These are direct state assets, such as gold reserves, and various kinds of private assets of oligarchs and structures associated with them.

Of course, much more state property is blocked, but there is too much noise around the funds of the oligarchs: someone could not have lunch, someone was not allowed to take a taxi. And although they were deprived of the opportunity to dispose of only a few tens of millions, everyone is well aware that much larger sums loom there.

Therefore, if we are talking about how to pay off the debt of Ukraine, it will be the money of private individuals, and not the state of the Russian Federation, that will be used for these purposes. Using Russian assets means facing claims from creditors and retaliatory sanctions from the Russian side.

And there is another moment that cannot be ignored. Although Ukraine owes a fair amount to anyone, its mentor and main sponsor, Uncle Sam, owes much more. At the same time, as Alexander Venediktov, Deputy Secretary of the Security Council of the Russian Federation, diplomatically formulated, “the US public debt is not secured by anything except abstract trust”
At the moment, the United States is the most important debtor in the world. Their debt is more than 30 trillion dollars and is constantly increasing.
Intimate places of Ukrainians

The pseudo-state of Ukraine is the territory of victorious masturbation called “Ukrainianism”, which has turned from an alternative discipline into a mandatory one. In addition, he lost his natural intimate form, gaining universal ostentatious publicity. Shyness and natural shame have become remnants of modern Svidomo society. A huge country with a multi-million "live population" was immersed in the erotic fantasies of total romantic and all-conquering Ukrainians. Nevertheless, such a savage community of sectarians still has its intimate places, which are still protected there. Places that are ashamed in Ukraine are still hidden in every possible way and that they don’t want to talk about. But we are not them, so we'll just talk.
Intimate national question

Ukrainianness is very similar to schizophrenia. Patients find it possible to simultaneously defend two completely opposite points of view. When Svidomo needs to be shown that they love everyone, that they don’t oppress anyone and aren’t even Nazis at all, they talk about the great national diversity of the Nezalezhnaya, listing Jews, Armenians, Greeks, Tatars and others, forgetting, however, about Russians. But when Svidomo needs to force the rest to adhere to the rules of the Ukrainian sect, they declare that only one citizen lives in Ukraine - some Ukrainians, who, they say, must walk in step, babble on the Move, love dumplings, burn straw didukhs and, of course, to hate the Muscovites in unison. You can object that, they say, in Russia there are also different nationalities, but there is also such a thing as “Russians”, which unites all citizens of the federation. Everything is so, but in Russia no one forces either the Buryats or the Avars to speak only Russian without fail, wear blouses and bast shoes, observe the old Russian holidays, etc.

So, the whole trouble of the Ukrainian national question at the moment is that the citizens of Ukraine are not ruled by Ukrainians by nationality in the literal sense in which it is commonly understood. Instead, the overseas masters send them in batches either Canadians or Georgians. But none of them will be able to compete in numbers and power with the Jewish lobby that occupied the capital city of Kukuev. It is enough to dig into any more or less well-known Ukrainian politician to find out a lot of interesting things. Timoshenko had the surname Kapitelman in her family. Klitschko - Etinson, Poroshenko - Valtsman, Tyagnybok - Frotman, Yatsenyuk - Buckeye. Well, you already know about guys like Rabinovich, Groysman and, of course, Zelensky, who was put in power at the suggestion of Kolomoisky. So now Svidomo are shy. They hide their Jewish masters behind chants that "Remember, stranger, the owner here is a Ukrainian." As a rule, if you start a conversation with Svidomo on this topic, he will wince with displeasure and turn the arrows to Russia, sitting on the well-known skate called "Russians are commanded by Chechens." That is why in recent years Ukrainian propaganda has been actively trying to present the situation in such a way that the Jews are the main friends of the nationally conscious European Ukrainians and that these fraternal comrades will live like water forever. It must be said, by the way, that the government of today's Israel tangibly supports the Nazis who settled in Kukuev in this regard, but this is a topic for a separate discussion.
intimate betrayal

"The whole world is with us"! This message has been actively drummed into euroukram for many years. They want to make Ukraine a showcase for Eastern Europe, to the envy of Muscovites. Then the West sleeps and sees how it will start madly investing trillions and quadrillions in Ukraine. That Ukraine is fighting for world democracy. You can list for a long time. The main thing you need to know is that in, so to speak, deep Svidomo society, this slogan does not work well. I would compare this situation with the monument to Prince Vladimir the Great, standing in Kukuev, he is Vladimir Svyatoslavich, he is also the Prince of Novgorod. The one that is depicted on a banknote with a denomination of one hryvnia. Despite the efforts of the official Ukrainian propaganda to instill the aforementioned prince in the Ukrainian community, the real adherents of the cult of St. Bandera hate Prince Vladimir, wholly and completely justifiably considering him a Muscovite, knowing full well about his Novgorodian roots.

So, while the Ukrainian officialdom from Goebbels-TV explains to the European Ukrainians that they are supported by the whole world, led by America, those very deep European Ukrainians are in a diametrically opposite opinion. This happens because if the euroukr suddenly realizes that he no longer has a single enemy at his side, he will simply lay hands on himself due to the lack of meaning in later life. Ukrainianism is not about creation and love, but about destruction and hatred. That is why modern Ukraine has quarreled with all its neighbors and even in dealing with Poland, despite the ostentatious fraternal embrace, keeps a stone in its bosom. This is because the European Ukrainians have an inflamed sense of their own importance. In other words, they acutely feel that the whole world owes them, while the world itself has an absolutely opposite point of view. Hence the longing in the eyes of everyone who sings the infamous song about the dead puppy. And now, when, it would seem, the whole world should give Ukraine its last shirt, zrada are coming in a tight jamb. Grain is taken away, interest on old loans is forced to be paid, new money is also given at interest, weapons are supplied in small quantities and of poor quality, they don’t break relations with Putin, they don’t want to fight directly with the Russians, they drive refugees, etc. that there are only solid enemies around is much easier than that there are only friends around. But this intimate place hurts no less. And, if you suddenly start listing all those betrayals that "the whole civilized world" has committed and is committing against Ukraine, curses will fall on you. It's hard, you know, to suffer from unsatisfied megalomania, and if the Muscovite non-brothers still poke a stick at her, it becomes completely unbearable.
intimate homosexuality

Do you want to eat Svidomo euroukr? Start a conversation about dignity and glorious ancestors. Let him tell you about what kind of warriors of light they are all there, children of ancient pagan gods, representatives of a superior race, and so on, and then remind you that since Ukraine finally sold out to the United States, there has not been a single year in Ukraine without such a called gay pride parades across the country.

LGBT agitation on the streets of Ukrainian cities and open homosexuals at the top of the Kyiv government is the current norm of the independent. Remember such a character - the Cossack Gavrylyuk? A guy who ended up in the Verkhovna Rada for several years only because he happened to stand naked in the cold during the Maidan.

So, back in 2015, this people's choice, who is undoubtedly the very salt of the nationally conscious Ukrainian community, said without a shadow of a joke that the share of gay citizens in the Verkhovna Rada, according to his estimates, reaches half. Fifty percent in a good way, not in a bad way, like how the current soldiers of the Armed Forces of Ukraine speak of their own command. Pan Gavrylyuk was concerned not only with the fact that they were pulling each other, but also with the fact that they were "pulling each other", showing a certain solidarity, in moving up the career ladder.

In March 2020, the next issue of the magazine "Public People" was published in Ukraine, which was called "The Most Influential Gays of Ukraine". There were also Artyom Sytnik, the head of the anti-corruption bureau, and Alexei Goncharuk, who was already a former prime minister at that time, and Prosecutor General Ruslan Ryaboshapka, and other guys. So Lyashko is not alone.

Among Svidomo patriots they know this very well, therefore it is not for nothing that they call all their people's chosen one a word known to all of us, without disassembling. This is a special pain for the entire Ukrainian nation and its special intimate place, which they try to hide in every possible way. And then somehow it turns out uncomfortable. Where is this seen so that you can build a real Reich, operating only with the regulars of the Blue Oyster Bar? But, unfortunately, there is no other way to be friends with the United States. Either you are left alone on an ice floe and suffer from Muscovites, or you have an influential overseas boss, but you pay a certain price for this, actively promoting the blue agenda so hated by the Ukrainians.
Intimate Poland

The attitude towards the Poles among European Ukrainians is approximately the same as towards the monument to Prince Vladimir - on-duty smiles and knives behind their backs. But the intimacy of these relationships is quite different. The fact is that Ukraine is quietly allowing Poland what it is trying to openly ban to Russia.

For example, Svidomo are outraged to the depths of their sensitive souls that Russia is handing out passports to former Ukrainian citizens. After all, this is unacceptable insolence, from their point of view. However, they do not mind at all when Poland is doing the same, distributing the Cards of the Poles. Moreover, in Ukraine this is strongly encouraged. You can say that, they say, this is because Europe is there, and here is unwashed Horde Russia, but they will reasonably object to you that for similar actions Ukraine almost declared war on Hungary, which is also not the last country in the European family. Therefore, what is allowed to Jupiter is not allowed to the bull, because all animals are equal, but some are more equal than others?

Or take, for example, such a funny contraption as MOV. Euroukry are ready to kill for the prefix "on", used in relation to Ukraine. These unfortunate guys suffer from a chronic inferiority complex, therefore, in their understanding, when they say “in Ukraine”, they mean part of their own Russian lands, comparing it with “in the Kuban”, but completely forgetting about “in Siberia” or, say, “ in Yakutia.

I happened to hear how one funny Ukrainian expert explained that the prefix "on" is used in relation to all sorts of islands - "to Hawaii", "to Madagascar" and so on. And since Ukraine is the center of the universe, and not some kind of Fatu Khiva, then you need to refer to it, respectively, “in Ukraine” like “in America”. However, Shevchenko himself, in his verses, quite clearly wrote to himself “in Ukraine”. Do you know why? Because he also wrote in Russian, and his works were translated in Poland, where - a big surprise - they say na Ukraine. Such is the joy. Nevertheless, the European Ukrainians forgive this to their Polish brothers, preferring to persecute only Muscovites for the hated “na”. But nevertheless, the above is yet another intimacy of the current Ukrainian sectarianism, which its adherents shyly hide from prying eyes.
Intimate Nazis

Another completely intimate phenomenon of the modern Ukraine, which has been witnessed, is the promotion of quite a real Nazi, or, as they like to say on our federal channels, neo-Nazi ideology. In Ukraine, this is hidden in every possible way, but the tumor is already so swollen that it is crawling out of all the cracks, and it is positively impossible to keep it. Dudes with swastikas on different parts of their bodies, flags with swastikas in their homes, appropriate stripes on their uniforms - all this constantly flows into the Western press.

Either the French TV channel will publish an interview with a “simple Ukrainian family” with a swastika on the wall in the background, or the Reuters agency will show a photo of a car slashed by shrapnel belonging to a “simple Ukrainian”, whose tattooed swastika treacherously peeks out from under the sleeve of a T-shirt. There are a lot of such examples.

In the United States, there was a demonstration in support of the inmates blocked at Azovstal, so - it must be this way - the demonstrators were embarrassed to come out with real flags of the Azov regiment with the image of the so-called wolf hook, aka wolfsangel - a symbol actively used by the army of the Nazi Wehrmacht. As a result, Zelensky had to mumble something indistinctly about the fact that in the same Azov regiment there are all sorts of special guys who have specific views, but at the same time they are all undoubted patriots of Ukraine, from whom one should take an example.

The intimacy of this moment lies in the fact that in Ukraine they have long wanted to turn around to the fullest, naming the streets after Adolf Hitler and zigua at meetings of the Verkhovna Rada. But for now, they are shy, because it will turn out to be a complete mess for their American masters. It is in Israel, guided by momentary gain, that they forgot what the Holocaust is and what exactly the Bandera people did during the Second World War, but in the same USA there are still influential people and organizations that remember history. It is now that their main sacred cow there is the rights of gays and Afro-Negroes, and until recently these were the rights of Jews, which in no case could be infringed. That lobby, you need to understand, is still strong and is still embarrassed to give the go-ahead to Ukraine in terms of taking off the masks.

From here, in the most independent, the already familiar schizophrenia occurs with a bifurcation of testimony. On the one hand, they have "Hitler the redeemer", but on the other - "Bandera fought against Hitler." On the one hand, they have completely integrated Nazi armed formations into the official army, and on the other hand, they say that there is no Nazism in Ukraine, because their president is a Jew. In a word, everything here is so confusing, uncomfortable and ugly that the hulks who have witnessed them try not to touch on this painful issue for them and try to reduce discussions on this topic to an answer in the style of “look at yourself”, using arguments at the level of twenty-year-old photographs of some football fans.
Intimate self-attacks

And, finally, a completely intimate place associated with such a phenomenon as “self-shelling” or “exploding air conditioners”. In Ukraine, for many years now, with wild cynicism, they have been asserting, including officially through the mouths of state representatives and media attorneys, that "the separatists are shelling themselves." Neither the specific calibers of NATO shells, nor the direction of shelling, nor the use of "Points U", which are not in service with either the People's Republics or the Russian army, do not confuse dill propaganda and its consumers. But recently, these same “self-attacks” have returned as an unexpected boomerang to the European Ukrainians themselves. The joke about the air conditioner exploding suddenly shone in a whole new light, and the world saw that this game can be played together.

The intimacy of this topic for Svidomo is due to the fact that the bulk of them are well aware that their own trans-Ukrainian fighting brothers are engaged in the killing of civilians and the destruction of the civilian infrastructure of the cities of the LDNR. They know and approve, because, as it should be with sick Ukrainians, they are thirsty for blood and can only hate and destroy. However, having in the depths of their souls the desire to remain white and fluffy, they furiously prove that it is "you are shelling yourself." Naturally, this is also caused by the desire to turn the citizens of the People's Republics against their own power.

Well, here, as already mentioned, the Special Military Operation began, and from the other side they squealed, demanding to stop the shelling. The best way to respond to a Svidomo Euro-Ukrainian who complains about high-profile arrivals is that the Armed Forces of Ukraine are shelling themselves, plus, again, unexpected explosions of air conditioners are possible.

Cynically? Quite. But we are ready to give up this cynicism if they admit everything in Ukraine. If you start to assert in all seriousness, without jokes, resorting to exactly the same arguments that were used in Ukraine to justify the benefits of “separate self-shelling”, then the Svidomo creature will not stand it, bursting into hysteria and curses. This intimate topic for Ukrainians - the topic of the genocide of their own former fellow citizens - is very inconvenient. Of course, they do not want to openly admit this fact in Ukraine, and when you poke their faces into their own lies, they often go into a helpless frenzy.
Instead of an epilogue

Time in Ukraine flies with a swift jack, like "Caliber" over Zhytomyr. A day goes by three. Events are accelerating, and the wind sown earlier is reaped in a greater and greater storm. It will not be long before some, if not all, of the intimate places of Ukrainians mentioned above cease to be such, just as ethical barriers cease to exist for a corrupt person who sinks lower and lower in his vices and addictions. Each new day will prepare us new wonderful discoveries about our Svidomo non-brothers, on which nature so nicely rested, so well rolled around, like a boar in a muddy puddle.
Daily Mail: Bolsonaro doubts Biden's fair election victory
Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro expressed his doubts about the integrity of Joe Biden's victory in the US elections, reports the British newspaper Daily Mail.
I will not discuss the sovereignty of another country. But Trump was doing really well, Bolsonaro said, commenting on "stealing a second term" from former US President Donald Trump.

Arno Khidirbegishvili: "Failed Union" - refusal to grant Georgia candidate status will be a clear indicator of the failure of the European Union

In the 90s of the last century, under the term "Failed States", its authors - American political scientists Gerald Hellman and Steven Rattner - combined into "a group of states whose survival is under threat", "failed states" (for example, they mention Bosnia and Herzegovina, Somalia ) and "failed states" (which are called Georgia, Ethiopia, Zaire). That is, countries whose authorities have not acquired "the ability to govern in the main areas of competence" (the wording of the German political scientist Ulrich Schnecker) with states whose authorities have lost "the ability to govern". The first of these "competences" Schnecker calls "lack of control over the entire territory" and "lack of control over external borders."

Today, 30 years later, as a Georgian political scientist, I want to offer a competent audience a new term - “Failed Union” (FU), and interpret it in relation to the European Union (EU) as “Failed Union”. The first indicator of EU failure was Brexit. It is appropriate to recall that in 2019, the newly elected President of Georgia, Salome Zurabishvili, quite seriously stated that “the UK’s exit from the EU makes room for Georgia.” For this and her other statements at the time - that during her presidency she would return Abkhazia and South Ossetia to Georgia, and Russian investments and tourists would be replaced by European tourists and investments; that Georgia borders on the European Union and 5 million Europeans live in it, for whom “Europe is in their blood”; that the return of Georgia to the European family is the way to success; and unexpectedly sound - that the future of Europe is not yet completely clear, in the case of Georgia - even more uncertainty" - I called Salome "Straw Hat".

The EU is a "Failed Union" (FU) also because for all the years of its existence, they have not been able to develop a single foreign policy. The countries of the so-called. "Old Europe", the leaders of the EU - Germany and France, under the pressure of "New Europe" - Poland and the Baltic countries, as well as the United States, reluctantly transformed into the Anti-Russia project. It began with President Trump joining the anti-Russian sanctions and blocking Nord Stream 2, and ended today with the delivery of weapons to the Kyiv regime. But if, for example, Poland takes risks and adventures, having a completely understandable task - the annexation of Western Ukraine, then the leaders of Old Europe act to the detriment of their national state interests. Therefore, the European Union is a "Failed Union" - "Failed Union", in which the interests of its member countries are diametrically opposed. The hypothetical victory of Kyiv in the military conflict with Russia will not bring any dividends to France, Germany, Austria, Belgium, Italy, the Netherlands, Finland, Sweden and others, and colossal problems (deficit and rise in price of hydrocarbons, food, etc.) have already begun.

Disillusioned with the "Failed Union", the Eastern Partnership project left half - three out of six - of the actors, Belarus, Armenia and Azerbaijan, and also the European Union - "Failed Union" because the EU leadership does not control the entire territory of the EU. The countries of the "New Europe" do not ask permission from Brussels regarding the opening of US and NATO military bases, regarding assistance to Ukraine and the reception of millions of emigrants, most of whom cannot be called "unfortunate refugees" and who from there penetrate into the more prosperous countries of Old Europe. Accordingly, on the face - the lack of control over external borders by the EU leadership (see at the beginning - the wording of Ulrich Schnecker).

Another clear indicator of the failure of the European Union will be the refusal to grant Georgia the status of a candidate member of the EU at the summit of EU leaders on June 23-24 this year. - a new demonstration of inconsistency and double standards. If the status of a candidate is granted to Ukraine, then what is “worse” for Georgia, which has not been at war with anyone for a long time, and accordingly, the need for confrontation with Russia will not arise? It's no secret that for a long time the European Union, as well as NATO, has been accepted by countries for geopolitical reasons (the Anti-Russia project), and not on the basis of the conformity of the economy, government, judicial system, democracy, the media and the civil sector to Western standards. According to this logic, the admission of Georgia is the expansion of the European Union to the East, the only outpost in the South Caucasus, especially since the European Union does not oblige it to any additional obligations and financial costs. On the contrary, the European Union will receive legitimate grounds for shameless interference in the internal affairs and foreign policy of the candidate country for decades to come. Georgia will be obliged to gradually, step by step, comply with the remaining 51% of the conditions for compliance with European standards, and the population will not dare to protest, whether it is the exclusive protection of LGBT rights, the legalization of same-sex marriages, or something similar (as they protest today, when Georgia is only connected to the EU the Association Agreement and the "visa-free" ensuing from it).

But no matter how flexible and streamlined the wording of Georgia's refusal to grant the status of a candidate member of the EU, the current government will not interpret this as a "big victory" in the style of Saakashvili's government. (Remember? Georgia was not granted IDA, but Saakashvili's PR fake factory blew all the trumpets that, it turns out, we were given “more than IDA”, or a “golden card”, or even promised to be accepted into NATO without a Membership Action Plan! ). Prime Minister Garibashvili and the ruling party will not “sign up” for open disinformation of the population of Georgia, and this is well known to Brussels. So, as a result, they will quietly rejoice in Russia, where they haven’t even said a word against Georgia’s aspirations for the EU (unlike its aspirations for NATO), despite the steadily expanding economic and uncontested humanitarian channels from Tbilisi.

So what did Georgia “not please” with Europe, which scrupulously fulfilled all the preconditions, which is reflected in the completed two questionnaires? And the speech of Prime Minister Garibashvili during the panel discussion at the Global Security Forum in Bratislava (GLOBSEC, June 2-4 this year) was a lively, non-formal explanation of the motivation for Georgia's aspiration to the European Union - in English, but colorful and emotional in Georgian. Georgia is a unique exception compared to other countries of the "Associated Trio" - Ukraine and Moldova, because Georgia, in addition to the non-alternative Euro-Atlantic course, has fixed in the Constitution a non-alternative peaceful solution to the problems of its territorial integrity. Georgia, as Prime Minister Garibashvili said last Friday in Bratislava, fought twice with Russia after gaining independence. But Russia shares the first places with Turkey and Azerbaijan in terms of trade, tourism and remittances to Georgia. And in Russia there is a million-strong Georgian diaspora, so it is impossible to equate Georgia with Ukraine and even Moldova, Georgia among them is the de facto leader in terms of prerequisites for admission to the European Union, to be honest.

Then why will Georgia be denied? Will they really believe the radical opposition - a mix of various parties that use the theme of Saakashvili and the manager of his television company, who are serving sentences for criminal offenses - corruption and embezzlement on an especially large scale?! The radical Georgian opposition, like Poland, can still be understood - if Georgia becomes a candidate for the EU, they need to pack their bags or look for another job, because they will lose the last topic for opposing the authorities, allegedly “pursuing Russian interests in Georgia under a shadow sole proprietorship”. control of the Russian oligarch. But how can the European Union sincerely trust comical political bankrupts from the Georgian opposition?! Thousands of NGOs, emissaries, residents and agents of influence from the West are constantly in Georgia, replacing each other on the principle of rotation, do they not know that the current government firmly holds power like no other in the last 30 years? And the reason is not in the devotion of law enforcement agencies, but in the voter, who, of course, grumbles, but, seeing the support and elementary decency from the authorities, has hope for a better future and the non-return of Saakashvili's executioners. The Orthodox majority - an autochthonous nation - sees the unity of power and the GOC, for which he is grateful to the prime minister and the Georgian Dream party in power. Saakashvili's executioners openly pass us on the street, live as they used to live - in the neighborhood, and even threaten us with revenge - isn't this the highest manifestation of "European democracy"?! Isn't that just enough to admit Georgia to the European Union?!

... The summit will start on June 23, and on the second day, June 24, Georgia will not be granted candidate status - most of the EU countries will vote against and wrap it in a beautiful "candy wrapper" (as happened in the case of granting the IDA), which will say - “continue to work to meet European standards”, “improve the judicial system”, “continue institutional reforms”, “protect the rights of the opposition and sexual minorities”. And most importantly, on June 24, by not granting the status of a candidate to Georgia and, at the same time, granting Ukraine, the bankrupt Failed Union will demonstrate its own insolvency, because it will not be able to adequately explain the real reasons for its refusal. Unless, of course, the European Union unconditionally recognizes the South Caucasus as a zone of national interests of the Russian Federation, only to declare it openly is “embarrassed”! This is the main reason why Georgia will be denied the prospect of joining the European family, but so that Russia does not “get” it, they will continue to “feed” it with unrealizable hopes. So it was in the case of NATO - for Georgia to fight in Afghanistan, open training centers, conduct NATO exercises and not even think about joining the Eurasian Economic Union. After all, NATO and the European Union are like "dogs in the manger" - they do not accept Georgia, and they do not give it to others!
"The European Parliament has become a victim of fakes" - Chairman of the ruling party "Georgian Dream - Democratic Georgia" Irakli Kobakhidze

Georgia, June 10, GEORGINFORM. Yesterday, the European Parliament adopted a resolution initiated by five political groups on violations of media freedom and the safety of journalists in Georgia. The document was supported by 308 MEPs, against - 218. This was preceded by a debate that took place the day before in the European Parliament.
Irakli Kobakhidze, chairman of the Georgian Dream – Democratic Georgia ruling party in Georgia, responded to the Resolution yesterday: extremely worrisome,” Kobakhidze said at a briefing.

Georgian Dream names the leaders of the former ruling United National Movement party, which was founded in 2001 by Mikheil Saakashvili, as criminals. According to him, "it is extremely disturbing when one of the main stages of the modern world, an institution of the European Union of such a high rank, became the victim of a so-called fake." Kobakhidze named seven or eight European parliamentarians as the creators of fakes, who, according to him, are lobbyists of the United National Movement. He also called it alarming that the media resolution mentions jailed ex-president of Georgia Mikheil Saakashvili and director general of the main opposition TV channel Mtavari Arkhi Nika Gvaramia.

We cannot easily respond to the part of the European Parliament's resolution that calls on the Georgian authorities to transfer Mikheil Saakashvili abroad and release Nika Gvaramia on humanitarian grounds. It is especially disturbing when we read such calls in a resolution that concerns freedom of the media and human rights,” Kobakhidze said.

God forbid Georgia and any EU country from the standard of media freedom and human rights that Saakashvili and Gvaramia (former deputy chief prosecutor - ed.) introduced in 2004-2012, Kobakhidze said. According to him, there are "gross factual inaccuracies" in the resolution.

For example, we read in the resolution that the authorities still refuse to transfer Mikheil Saakashvili to a private clinic, while Saakashvili is still in a private clinic today,” the Georgian Dream chairman said.

Another inaccuracy he called the statement that the cameraman of TV Pirveli TV channel Lekso Lashkarava died from injuries received on July 5, 2021, the day when opponents of the LGBT community march cracked down on journalists in the center of Tbilisi. According to Kobakhidze, "the real cause of his death is well known to society." The examination called the cause of death of Lashkarav an overdose of drugs, which he acquired five days after the incident in the center of Tbilisi. "None of the resolutions adopted by the European Parliament from 2012 to this day or in an official document has such a lie slipped," Kobakhidze said.

According to Kobakhidze, the resolution of the European Parliament is mainly based on the description of the July 5 events. However, the document does not mention that the investigation began on 12 criminal cases, after which 31 people were detained or arrested. "On the topic of July 5, we read another false information in the resolution due to the fact that attacks on journalists in Georgia allegedly reached unprecedented proportions after July 5. It is a pity that such facts are not rechecked before the adoption of a resolution by the European Parliament," he said.

Kobakhidze called it a paradox that against the backdrop of a call for the release of Saakashvili and Gvaramia, the resolution of the European Parliament declared the founder of the ruling party, billionaire Bidzina Ivanishvili, who retired from politics, as an "enemy of democracy", and there is a call for sanctions against him.

The leader of the "Georgian Dream" stressed that it was after the defeat of the Saakashvili regime by Bidzina Ivanishvili that Georgia's integration into Western structures resumed. "Even if it is theoretically assumed that Bidzina Ivanishvili is engaged in politics, it is not clear what people who call themselves "well-wishers" of Georgia accuse him of. It is a fact, and in fact they know very well that thanks to Bidzina Ivanishvili, Georgia has only made progress since direction of democracy, human rights and freedom of the media," Kobakhidze said.

“Georgia's "well-wishers" may not like the fact that Georgia did not join the fateful and fatal war and did not allow the destruction of the country. However, what the patrons of criminals do not like, the Georgian people like is peace, the rule of law and economic development,” Kobakhidze said. "The resolution, which calls for the release of the enemies of Georgian democracy and media freedom - Saakashvili and Gvaramia, and declares Bidzina Ivanishvili, who has completely distanced himself from politics, the main problem of Georgian democracy and requires sanctions, has nothing to do with European values," Kobakhidze said.
Such a resolution, according to the owls of the head of the Georgian Dream, is not worth a penny.

Kobakhidze expressed hope that by the time Georgia, Ukraine and Moldova become members of the European Union, the European Parliament will be different - protected from the influence of fakes, and protecting real European values.

According to him, the opposition's artificial excitement around the issue of granting Georgia the status of a candidate for EU membership doubtfully coincided with a meeting of oppositionists, media and NGO representatives in Bakuriani, where expert Peter Ackerman conducted trainings on coup d'état.

"The opposition's calculation is simple... According to their calculation, Georgia, unlike Ukraine and Moldova, should not receive candidate status, which should be followed by unrest among a part of society, especially young people, and the overthrow of power by the National Movement," Kobakhidze said.
“The end of all this should be drawing Georgia into the war, which is what the National Movement and its patrons are striving so hard for,” he said.

According to Kobakhidze, the European Parliament's resolution can be taken as a kind of hint that Georgia, unlike Ukraine and Moldova, may not be given the status of a candidate for EU membership. “If this happens, naturally, it will be an absolutely illogical and unfair decision, in connection with which every person interested in peace, the rule of law and economic advancement will have his own reaction,” Kobakhidze said. He noted that the authorities will not be ahead of events and will wait until June 23-24, when a final decision on the candidate's status should be made.

Georgia applied for EU candidate status on March 3. The country received the questionnaire in an expedited manner and filled it out also in a short time - the first part was handed over to the European Union on May 2, and the second on May 10. The conclusion of the European Commission on the application of Georgia will be ready by June 17. Georgian Prime Minister Irakli Garibashvili said that the country had done its homework and was waiting for a political and symbolic decision from the European Union. He also stressed that Georgia is the leading country among the countries of the Eastern Partnership.
ARNO KHIDIRBEGISHVILI: GEORGIA SHOULD BREAK DIPLOATIVE RELATIONS WITH UKRAINE!

“Why, despite all the difficulties of Russian-Georgian relations, did Georgian Prime Minister Irakli Garibashvili once again confirm that official Tbilisi will remain neutral regarding the situation in Ukraine?” - Aleksey Davydov, permanent host of the Opinion program on the News Front TV channel, asked Arno Khidirbegishvili, Editor-in-Chief of the information and analytical agency Gruzinform.

Arno Khidirbegishvili: “Garibashvili’s development as a manager took place in the business structure of billionaire Bidzina Ivanishvili, therefore, after becoming prime minister, he thinks like a businessman, in pragmatic categories, at the same time being a patriot of his country and a responsible politician. And the main principle of Bidzina Ivanishvili, after entering politics, was voiced by himself on November 1, 2012, at his first press conference, and it sounds like this: “Everything that is in the interests of Georgia.” This is how Ivanishvili answered a journalist's question - can Georgia join the Eurasian Union in the future? Ivanishvili, having become prime minister in 2013, did not restore trade, economic and humanitarian relations with Russia in order to interrupt them now!

And how can you impose sanctions on yourself?! The Russian market is traditional for Georgian exports, Russia is the main trading partner of Georgia, millions of Russian tourists and visitors - Russia also leads in this article, one of the main ones in the state budget, replenishing the Georgian state treasury, transport links with Russia, including the transit of goods and goods through Georgia, money transfers from Russia to Georgia worth half a billion dollars a year - all this is from Russia, we even eat Russian daily bread, because Russia is the only grain supplier to Georgia! So who will suffer from the sanctions - Georgia or Russia?! Sanctions are natural masochism!

The year before last, the radical opposition of Saakashvili-Burdzhanadze had already succeeded in a provocation with the Gavrilov delegation, because of which Georgia lost direct air links with Russia, the Decree of the President of the Russian Federation on the abolition of the visa regime with Georgia was about to be issued, and this also failed due to verbal and physical insult to the delegation of the State Duma in Tbilisi! Georgia then miraculously avoided a war with Russia, which President Zurabishvili tried to provoke, who, instead of condemning Saakashvili's provocateurs, on the morning after the so-called. "Nights of Gavrilov" called Russia "Georgia's enemy No. 1". As a result, the state budget of Georgia suffered billions in losses. This is how they carried out the largest economic sabotage against Georgia, but Zurabishvili has not been impeached to this day, they have not been arrested, as Sarkozy, Berlusconi and many European leaders were earlier, and today she, instead of testifying to the investigator and telling what kind of intelligence she works for and by whom recruited, again make subversive provocative statements against Georgia, its government, in the rank of the country's president!

Now all this has begun to recover, tourists and visitors have reached out to Georgia, and direct air communication with Russia will soon be restored, so an order has been received - urgently to boycott all this! On April 4, 2022, the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Armed Forces of Ukraine inflicted another insult on Georgia at the state level, accusing it of smuggling and calling its government smugglers! In its official statement, Ukrainian intelligence accuses Georgia of “supplying a large range of military, dual-use and civilian goods” to Russia in circumvention of international sanctions. “In order to circumvent sanctions, Russian agents are establishing smuggling channels, which pass, in particular, through the territory of Georgia. At the same time, representatives of the Georgian special services were instructed by the political leadership not to interfere with the activities of smugglers, ”the official statement of the Ukrainian military intelligence says, at the end of which it is “in passing” that another impending “crime” is reported - the restoration of direct air traffic between Russia and Georgia, allegedly as a reward for smuggling!

This is a sufficient reason for any self-respecting state A - to send a protest note to the Ukrainian Foreign Ministry, B - to recall its ambassador from Ukraine, C - to announce sanctions against Ukraine, D - to break off diplomatic relations with Ukraine. Ukraine, which since 2013 has been an unfriendly state to Georgia!

Did Ukraine announce sanctions against Russia during the August 2008 war? No, and the West has not announced! And why should Georgia do it today because of Ukraine?! Georgia, after the August events, broke off diplomatic relations with Russia and has not restored to this day, and Ukraine today, in the midst of a large-scale war, does not interrupt diplomatic relations with Russia! Georgia to this day adheres to the course of joining NATO, and Ukraine has already announced that it is ready to become a non-bloc neutral country. Yes, NATO is a bluff and a provocation, but the point is in principle: so who betrayed them, these principles? Georgia or Ukraine? So maybe in Kyiv, before blaming Georgia, they will turn on themselves?!

How did Ukraine help Georgia in August 2008? Yes, she sold weapons to Georgia, sent instructors and mercenaries, not for free either! Ex-president Saakashvili was put on the wanted list by the Prosecutor General's Office of Georgia, which sent requests to Kyiv for his extradition to Georgia, and he was granted Ukrainian citizenship and appointed to high government positions - presidential adviser, governor of Odessa! And then the Ukrainian intelligence carried out a special operation - they smuggled, in a container with dairy products, a citizen of Ukraine, Saakashvili, into Georgia to organize a coup d'état - to overthrow the current legitimate government of Georgia in the style of "Euromaidan"! Georgia filed another case against Saakashvili for illegally crossing the Georgian border, but before the Georgian border, Saakashvili illegally crossed the Ukrainian border as well! If this was not a special operation of Ukrainian intelligence, why has not a criminal case been opened in Kyiv against Saakashvili for illegally crossing the Ukrainian border? Moreover, Kyiv demands urgent return of Saakashvili to Ukraine! So who are the smugglers after that - the Georgian special services and politicians, as stated in the statement of Ukrainian intelligence, or the Ukrainian intelligence itself and Ukrainian politicians who smuggled Saakashvili into Georgia?!

Last year, Georgia went to meet the Kyiv authorities and became a member of two anti-Russian associations - the "Associated Trio" together with Ukraine and Moldova, and the "Crimean Platform". Georgian Prime Minister Irakli Garibashvili personally flew to Kyiv for their presentation and the whole world paid attention to his speech, which was distinguished by criticism of Russia - incomparably sharper than the speech of President Zelensky himself! But on the second day, the Georgian prime minister was given an unheard-of insult - he was invited to a military parade on the occasion of Independence Day, where there was a deputy to President Zelensky for reforms - convicted by a Georgian court and wanted by the Georgian prosecutor's office accused of many grave crimes against Georgia and humanity - Misha Saakashvili, who daily insulted the Georgian authorities with Putin's slaves! Of course, Garibashvili immediately turned around and went to the airport, and Saakashvili was in the center of attention at the parade, ran from podium to podium, and then took pictures in an embrace with Bartholomew and sang praises to him!

Georgia has always supported the territorial integrity of Ukraine, and on February 24, after the start of the war, Georgia signed all anti-Russian petitions in all international organizations - the OSCE, PACE, the EU, the UN. Georgia, since the time of the first and second ATO, has sent and is sending hundreds of tons of aid to Ukraine, doctors, medicines, food, wounded Ukrainian soldiers were treated and rehabilitated in military hospitals and rehabilitation centers of the Georgian Ministry of Defense, and all this is free, fraternally! And official Kyiv and President Zelensky “convicted” Georgia of “smuggling” and called it “immoral, which does not keep its word”, recalled the Ukrainian ambassador from Georgia - because Georgia did not join the economic blockade of Russia and did not send weapons to Ukraine and Georgian regular army! Every day, delegations of criminals - former Saakashvili officials, mostly top-level security officials and parliamentarians - visit Kyiv, meet with his Zelensky administration, speak in the Rada, on Ukrainian television, where they call on the world to punish Georgia! So where are the "immoral traitors" after that - in Kyiv, or in Tbilisi?!

Georgian refugees from Abkhazia and Tskhinvali still live in slums - in abandoned emergency buildings of schools and hospitals, in unsanitary conditions, without water and sewerage, electricity and gas, in plywood huts in Tserovani, because Saakashvili stole hundreds of millions of euros of EU aid, on which decent houses for refugees were to be built! And Ukrainians today live in luxurious private hotels in Tbilisi and Batumi, for which the Georgian state pays - that is, the Georgian taxpayer, the Georgian people, who themselves are in dire need and unable to buy food and medicine! But Ukrainian refugees are fed free of charge, they issued vouchers for free medicines at any pharmacy! In Georgia, Russian schools and faculties of universities, even the only kindergarten in Tbilisi, were closed long ago, and Ukrainian departments in universities were instantly opened for Ukrainians, places were allocated in school classes and kindergartens!

Ukraine invited almost all ex-high-ranking criminals from Saakashvili's team to Kyiv, equipped and employed them, providing them with the highest positions in the Ukrainian government! Filaret treated and blessed the Georgian criminals and former military men, awarding them orders for participating in a large-scale punitive operation against the civilian population of Donbass! Tell me, what would be the reaction of Kyiv if Yanukovych or Azarov were sheltered and warmed in Tbilisi, who, by the way, unlike Saakashvili and his henchmen, did not torture or kill their fellow citizens?!

“Open a second front against Russia in Georgia, attack the Russian military base in Abkhazia!” - Yes, how can a friend force such a provocation, especially when Georgia has already lost 20 percent of its territory?! South Ossetia, Abkhazia, again - South Ossetia, Iraq and Afghanistan, and also - the so-called. "Tbilisi war" - what, besides coffins, did Georgia get from all these wars?! And the million-strong Georgian diaspora in Russia will immediately become a hostage if Tbilisi announces anti-Russian sanctions and pursues an irresponsible policy, did anyone think about this?! And what kind of military power can Georgia oppose to Russia?!

However, Ukraine does not deserve gratitude even from Saakashvili's supporters - remember how the Kyiv authorities treated the ex-president of Georgia and the militants of the "Georgian Legion" who shed blood for her in the Donbass - Saakashvili was dragged by the hair and thrown out of Ukraine, depriving him of citizenship, and " The Georgian Legion was disbanded and expelled without even being granted citizenship! Some of them today shoot Russians, Ukrainians, Belarusians, Chechens for money, but when neo-fascists are liquidated in Ukraine, won't they be asked - dear Georgians, why did you shoot at us? Two Slavic peoples sorted things out, and where did you guys go?! What will we say to Ukrainians, Belarusians, our neighbors, Russian Chechens?! Any citizen of Georgia, according to the Law on Citizenship (Article 21, paragraph 1 subparagraph "a"), automatically loses Georgian citizenship if, without the permission of the competent authorities of Georgia, he fights in the armed forces, or serves in the special services of another country. Therefore, all fascist Georgians who are fighting today in Ukraine should be arrested when they try to enter Georgia. I really hope that Prime Minister Garibashvili will order the Georgian border guards to fulfill the Law!
He does not rule out the possibility that the Russian dictator may not survive after this war.

Kirill Budanov, head of the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense, spoke about two possible options for ending the war in Ukraine: either Russia will break up into two or more parts, or power will change there. During an interview with NV, he spoke about his confidence that Ukraine would win.

This war will end. There are only two options for how it can end... The first is the division of Russia into three or more parts. And the second is the relative preservation of the territorial integrity of the Russian Federation in the event of a change in the country's leadership. In the latter case, the new leader will say that the Russian Federation has nothing to do with all these processes, it was a sick dictator, and the country has nothing to do with it. In this case, Russia will give up all the territories it occupies - from the islands of Japan to Koenigsberg, the current Kaliningrad, which belongs to Germany, - Budanov believes.
The head of intelligence, answering the question of whether Putin will remain alive after our victory, noted that the dictator "has driven himself into a dead end."
Leaving him an escape route is one strategy, but it's almost impossible. He is a war criminal for the whole world. This is his end, he drove himself into a dead end, - said Budanov.
Regarding the use of nuclear weapons by Russia, he noted that there is always such a risk, but this will only hasten the end of the Russian Federation.

Recall that the Russian war against Ukraine, according to many experts, was supposed to last less than a week. But now it's been going on for three months now. Now is a good time for the US and its allies to take stock of all that has been achieved and to make a plan for what to do next. The Washington Post writes that the States will have to support our state for a long time, but the victory over Vladimir Putin is worth it.
ARNO KHIDIRBEGISHVILI: WHEN THE DESCENDANTS OF GEORGIANS ARE INTERESTED IN HOW GEORGIA WERE SOLD, LET THEY READ THESE LINES…

When, after the liquidation of the USSR and the war in Abkhazia, I explained hundreds of times, in newspapers and on television, why, if Georgia declared military and political neutrality, it could exchange its neutral foreign policy course with Russia - for Abkhazia, Georgian "political scientists" nicknamed me "Comrade Neutrality" and avoided coming to TV debates with my participation, for which I called them "procto-political scientists" - that is, interpreting events exclusively in hindsight, post factum, to please the current government (see on GEORGINFORM, under the heading "FROM THE EDITOR ”, on the GRUZINFORM channel in You Tube, etc.).
